name: Animal Soccer: Star Match
description:
If you like cute animals and soccer, this is your game! Choose your team and have fun playing this fun soccer game.

Challenge your friends to play together and have tons of fun. Play with your favourite animal in this subbuteo-style game.

Collect them all!


◉ KEY FEATURES ◉

- 22 cute teams and multiple formations
- Multiplayer game
- Two player mode
- Tournaments
- Fun gameplay
- Easy to play


◉ GAMEPLAY ◉

- Flick the finger to move the animals
- Push the ball with an animal to score a goal.

Have fun downloading this soccer game and score as many goals as you can.

Do not forget to give us a positive review!
